about_the_game:
About This Game

In this story-driven horror game, you find yourself drawn to an old house hidden deep in the woods. Its halls are filled with cryptic puzzles. As you explore, every clue brings you closer to the truth—but some secrets are better left undisturbed.

With fully 3D movement, voice-acted dialogue, and an emphasis on immersive storytelling, this is a horror experience where every step matters.

Features:

  • 3D Exploration: Wander freely through a manor and its surrounding grounds.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve interconnected puzzles that test your logic and observation skills.

  • Atmospheric Horror: A haunting blend of sound, lighting, and environment to keep you on edge.

  • Layered Storytelling: Piece together the history of the manor and its secrets as you progress.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 20 series or better, or AMD RX 6000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: What starts as a simple dare quickly turns into a fight for survival as Claire and Jamie explore the dark, abandoned rooms, solve eerie puzzles, and uncover the terrifying truth behind the family’s death. Can they escape, or will they become the house’s next victims?
